definition: (of workers) to have no work to do/to be underutilized (due to lack of supplies, poor organization by management etc)
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: In most factories technicians are sitting idle because of poor organization of work.
sentences.chinese: 绝大多数工厂的技术干部都有窝工现象。

definition: time allocated for a project/completion date
to delay one's work/to be late for or absent from work/loss of working time
construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
final account/to calculate the final bill/fig. to draw up plans to deal with sth
to be absent from work or school
second party (law)/see also 甲方[jia3 fang1]
to stop work/to shut down/to stop production
service (work done for money)/services (as in "goods and services")
